Agnolog v{{VERSION}}

Build Information
=================
Version:     {{VERSION}}
Platform:    {{PLATFORM}}
Build Date:  {{BUILD_DATE}}
Python:      {{PYTHON_VERSION}}
Commit:      {{COMMIT}}
Commit Full: {{COMMIT_FULL}}
Repository:  {{REPO_URL}}

Platforms Built
===============
- Linux AMD64 (x86_64)
- macOS AMD64 (Intel x86_64)
- macOS ARM64 (Apple Silicon)
- Windows AMD64 (x86_64)

Build Process
=============
1. Dependencies: pip install + lupa C extension compilation
2. Bundling: PyInstaller --onefile with resources embedded
3. Resources: 8 themes (YAML data + Lua generators) bundled
4. Optimization: stripped symbols, excluded unused packages

Included Themes
===============
mmorpg, linux-logs, macos, windows11, windowsxp, crypto-trading, cex-engine, chess.com

Verify Authenticity
===================
Repository: {{REPO_URL}}
Commit:     {{REPO_URL}}/commit/{{COMMIT_FULL}}

Clone, checkout the commit, and build locally:
  git clone {{REPO_URL}}.git
  cd agnolog
  git checkout {{COMMIT_FULL}}
  pip install -e ".[dev]"
  make build-binary

Compare SHA256 checksums with SHA256SUMS.txt from the release.
